conbody.p: If there is a linear relationship between two variables x and y then the relation between these two variables can be represented by the equation.y = ax + b y is the dependent variable x is the independent variable a is a constant b is a constant
The chart of y = ax + b is a straight line, linear. The slope of this line is a, and the intersection with the y-axis is b.

If there are measurement results you can use Excel to
draw a chart of the points.
draw a trend line (the best fitting line).
determine the equation of the trendline.
determine the slope and intersection with Excel functions..
